item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 6th January
item.description:
The street tree has low branches which are overhanging the driveway and catching and scraping vehicles it. Wood is continually dropping on the driveway. This was reported in September 2024 and over a year later has not been fixed.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 15 inch pothole after turn into Cooper's Hill, 5th January
item.description:

item.title: Pothole, 5th January
item.description:
You've logged the pothole at the junction of Pottersfield Road and New Road for repair, which I reported â€”thank you. However this one which I reported at the same time is just as bad (you have to swerve to avoid it). As you'll have a crew coming out anyway would it not make economic sense to repair this one at the same time?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pottersfield Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping - large fan in black plastic bin liner, 5th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Street light not on, 5th January
item.description:
USRN : 40103545 Street : BISHOPS CLEEVE FOOTPATH 37 Number : ABC37 Type : FP Along this foot path near orchard house. I observed that there is a street lamp that is not operational. It was dark when I went along there a few weeks ago and the path was unlit. It is not clear if this is a GCC responsibility but it appears to be a regular streetlight along a PROW. FYI - I could not report this as a broken streetlight because fixmystreet only allows street light reporting on highways and not along PROW.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodman's Way, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole in the road, 5th January
item.description:
Hi. There is a tarmac'ed over square that must have been a manhole at some point. The tarmac is now sinking and when vehicles hit it, it makes our whole house (37 Hales Road) shake. We're property 63 on your map.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 59, Hales Road, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
